name: Audio
description: Play sound effects and music from files you've imported.

conditions.name: On ended
conditions.description: Triggered when an audio file finishes playing.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The audio tag that finished.

conditions.name: Preloads complete
conditions.description: True when all preloaded audio is ready to play.

conditions.name: Is silent
conditions.description: True if silent mode has been enabled.

conditions.name: Is any playing
conditions.description: True if any audio is actively playing.

conditions.name: Is tag playing
conditions.description: True if any audio with a given tag is currently playing.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The audio tag of the file to test if playing.

conditions.name: On fade ended
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Fade volume' when the fade finishes.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The audio tag that finished a fade.

actions.name: Add filter effect
actions.description: Add a bi-quad filter effect to all audio with a given tag.
actions.display_text: Add {1} filter to tag {0} (frequency [i]{2}[/i], detune [i]{3}[/i], Q [i]{4}[/i], gain [i]{5}[/i], mix [i]{6}[/i])

params.name: Tag
params.description: The audio tag to process.

params.name: Type
params.description: Select the kind of filter to use for this effect.

params.name: Frequency
params.description: The frequency parameter for the chosen filter, in Hertz.

params.name: Detune
params.description: The detune to apply, in cents.

params.name: Q
params.description: The filter Q factor.

params.name: Gain
params.description: The filter gain, if applicable, in decibels.

params.name: Mix
params.description: The wet/dry mix, from 0 (no effect) to 100 (full effect).

actions.name: Remove all effects
actions.description: Remove all effects from a given tag.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The audio tag to remove effects from.

actions.name: Add delay effect
actions.description: Add a delay effect to all audio with a given tag.
actions.display_text: Add [i]{1}[/i] second delay effect to tag {0} (gain [i]{2}[/i] dB, mix [i]{3}[/i])

params.name: Tag
params.description: The audio tag to process.

params.name: Delay
params.description: The delay time in seconds.

params.name: Gain
params.description: The gain of the delayed audio in decibels.

params.name: Mix
params.description: The wet/dry mix, from 0 (no effect) to 100 (full effect).

actions.name: Add convolution effect
actions.description: Add a convolution effect (using another sound as impulse response) to all audio with a given tag.
actions.display_text: Add convolution effect with [b]{1}[/b] to tag {0} ([i]{2}[/i], mix [i]{3}[/i])

params.name: Tag
params.description: The audio tag to process.

params.name: Audio
params.description: Choose an audio file containing an impulse response to use for the convolution effect.

params.name: Level
params.description: Choose whether to normalize or leave intact the audio file used above.

params.name: Mix
params.description: The wet/dry mix, from 0 (no effect) to 100 (full effect).

actions.name: Set effect parameter
actions.description: Set or ramp the parameter of an effect.
actions.display_text: Set tag {0} effect [i]{1}[/i] parameter [b]{2}[/b] to [b]{3}[/b] ({4} in [i]{5}[/i] seconds)

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag the effect was added for.

params.name: Index
params.description: The zero-based index of the added effect to modify, e.g. 0 for first effect, 1 for second, etc.

params.name: Parameter
params.description: Select the effect parameter to modify.

params.name: Value
params.description: The value to set for the parameter.

params.name: Ramp
params.description: Whether to immediately set the value or smoothly ramp to the intended value.

params.name: Time
params.description: The duration of the ramp in seconds, or the delay before stepping the value.

actions.name: Add flanger effect
actions.description: Add a flanger or chorus style effect to all audio with a given tag.
actions.display_text: Add flanger effect to tag {0} (delay [i]{1}[/i] ms, modulation [i]{2}[/i] ms, frequency [i]{3}[/i] Hz, feedback [i]{4}[/i], mix [i]{5}[/i])

params.name: Tag
params.description: The audio tag to process.

params.name: Delay
params.description: The delay time, in milliseconds.

params.name: Modulation
params.description: The magnitude by which to alter the delay time, in milliseconds. Set to 0 for a chorus style effect.

params.name: Frequency
params.description: The frequency over which to cycle the delay time, in hertz.

params.name: Feedback
params.description: The feedback amount, from 0 (none) to 100 (all).

params.name: Mix
params.description: The wet/dry mix, from 0 (no effect) to 100 (full effect).

actions.name: Add phaser effect
actions.description: Add a phaser effect to all audio with a given tag.
actions.display_text: Add phaser effect to tag {0} (frequency [i]{1}[/i] Hz, detune [i]{2}[/i] cents, Q [i]{3}[/i], modulation [i]{4}[/i], modulation frequency [i]{5}[/i], mix [i]{6}[/i])

params.name: Tag
params.description: The audio tag to process.

params.name: Frequency
params.description: The frequency in Hertz where the center of the phase transition occurs.

params.name: Detune
params.description: The detune to apply, in cents.

params.name: Q
params.description: The filter Q factor.

params.name: Modulation
params.description: The magnitude by which to alter the frequency, in Hertz.

params.name: Modulation frequency
params.description: The frequency over which to cycle the modulation, in hertz.

params.name: Mix
params.description: The wet/dry mix, from 0 (no effect) to 100 (full effect).

actions.name: Add gain effect
actions.description: Add a gain (volume adjustment) effect to all audio with a given tag.
actions.display_text: Add gain effect to tag {0} ([i]{1}[/i] dB)

params.name: Tag
params.description: The audio tag to process.

params.name: Gain
params.description: The volume adjustment, in decibels.

actions.name: Add compressor effect
actions.description: Add a dynamics compressor effect to all audio with a given tag.
actions.display_text: Add compressor effect to tag {0} (threshold [i]{1}[/i] dB, knee [i]{2}[/i] dB, ratio [i]{3}[/i], attack [i]{4}[/i] ms, release [i]{5}[/i] ms)

params.name: Tag
params.description: The audio tag to process.

params.name: Threshold
params.description: The threshold above which compression occurs, in dB.

params.name: Knee
params.description: The range above the threshold where the curve smoothly transitions to the 'ratio' portion, in dB.

params.name: Ratio
params.description: The amount of dB change in input for a 1dB change in output.

params.name: Attack
params.description: The time in which to reduce gain by 10dB, in milliseconds.

params.name: Release
params.description: The time in which to increase gain by 10dB, in milliseconds.

actions.name: Add tremolo effect
actions.description: Add a tremolo (amplitude modulation) effect to all audio with a given tag.
actions.display_text: Add tremolo effect to tag {0} ([i]{1}[/i] Hz, mix [i]{2}[/i])

params.name: Tag
params.description: The audio tag to process.

params.name: Frequency
params.description: The frequency of amplitude modulation, in Hertz.

params.name: Mix
params.description: The wet/dry mix, from 0 (no effect) to 100 (full effect).

actions.name: Add analyser effect
actions.description: Add an audio analyser in to a tag's effect chain.
actions.display_text: Add analyser effect to tag {0} (FFT size [i]{1}[/i], smoothing [i]{2}[/i])

params.name: Tag
params.description: The audio tag to process.

params.name: FFT size
params.description: The size of the FFT used for frequency-domain analysis. Must be a power of two.

params.name: Smoothing
params.description: The smoothing time constant, from 0 (no averaging with last analysis frame) to 1 (averaging).

actions.name: Add ring mod effect
actions.description: Add a ring modulator effect to all audio with a given tag.
actions.display_text: Add ring modulator effect to tag {0} ([i]{1}[/i] Hz, mix [i]{2}[/i])

params.name: Tag
params.description: The audio tag to process.

params.name: Frequency
params.description: The frequency of the ring modulator, in Hertz.

params.name: Mix
params.description: The wet/dry mix, from 0 (no effect) to 100 (full effect).

actions.name: Add distortion effect
actions.description: Add a distortion effect to all audio with a given tag.
actions.display_text: Add distortion effect to tag {0} (threshold [i]{1}[/i] dB, headroom [i]{2}[/i] dB, drive [i]{3}[/i], make-up gain [i]{4}[/i] dB, mix [i]{5}[/i])

params.name: Tag
params.description: The audio tag to process.

params.name: Threshold
params.description: The distortion threshold, in dB.

params.name: Headroom
params.description: The distortion headroom, in dB.

params.name: Drive
params.description: The distortion drive.

params.name: Make-up gain
params.description: The additional volume increase after the effect, in dB.

params.name: Mix
params.description: The wet/dry mix, from 0 (no effect) to 100 (full effect).

actions.name: Add mute effect
actions.description: Add a mute to an effect chain, useful after an analyser.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The audio tag to mute.

actions.name: Play at position
actions.description: Play audio at a position in the layout.
actions.display_text: Play [b]{0}[/b] {1} at volume {2} dB at position ([i]{3}[/i], [i]{4}[/i], [i]{5}[/i]), angle [i]{6}[/i] (inner angle [i]{7}[/i], outer angle [i]{8}[/i], outer gain [i]{9}[/i] dB) with tag [i]{10}[/i]

params.name: Audio file
params.description: Choose the audio file to play.

params.name: Loop
params.description: Whether or not to initially play the sound in a loop (repeating).

params.name: Volume
params.description: The attenuation in decibels (dB).  0 is original volume, -10 dB is about half as loud, etc.

params.name: X
params.description: The X position in the layout to play the sound at.

params.name: Y
params.description: The Y position in the layout to play the sound at.

params.name: Angle
params.description: The angle in degrees to play at, if a directional source.

params.name: Inner angle
params.description: The cone inner angle (for full volume sound for directional sources) in degrees. 360 means a non-directional sound.

params.name: Outer angle
params.description: The cone outer angle (where volume is reduced for directional sources) in degrees.

params.name: Outer gain
params.description: The volume reduction in decibels outside the outer angle, for directional sources.

params.name: Tag (optional)
params.description: A tag, which can be anything you like, to use to reference this sound in future.

params.name: Z
params.description: The Z position in the layout to play the sound at.

actions.name: Play at object
actions.description: Play audio at an object and track its movement.
actions.display_text: Play [b]{0}[/b] {1} at volume {2} dB at object {3} (inner angle [i]{4}[/i], outer angle [i]{5}[/i], outer gain [i]{6}[/i] dB) with tag [i]{7}[/i]

params.name: Audio file
params.description: Choose the audio file to play.

params.name: Loop
params.description: Whether or not to initially play the sound in a loop (repeating).

params.name: Volume
params.description: The attenuation in decibels (dB).  0 is original volume, -10 dB is about half as loud, etc.

params.name: Object
params.description: Choose the object to play the sound at.

params.name: Inner angle
params.description: The cone inner angle (for full volume sound for directional sources) in degrees. 360 means a non-directional sound.

params.name: Outer angle
params.description: The cone outer angle (where volume is reduced for directional sources) in degrees.

params.name: Outer gain
params.description: The volume reduction in decibels outside the outer angle, for directional sources.

params.name: Tag (optional)
params.description: A tag, which can be anything you like, to use to reference this sound in future.

actions.name: Set listener object
actions.description: Set the object to which volume and panning are relative.

params.name: Object
params.description: Choose the object to represent the listener.

actions.name: Set listener Z
actions.description: Set the listener height above the layout.

params.name: Z
params.description: The new listener Z (height above the layout), in pixels.

actions.name: Play at object (by name)
actions.description: Play an audio file by its name at an object and track its movement.
actions.display_text: Play [b]{1}[/b] {2} from {0} at volume {3} dB at object {4} (inner angle [i]{5}[/i], outer angle [i]{6}[/i], outer gain [i]{7}[/i] dB) with tag [i]{8}[/i]

params.name: Folder
params.description: Choose the folder which contains the audio file.

params.name: Audio file name
params.description: A string with the name of the audio file to play, without the file extension.  For example, to play myfile.webm, use only "myfile".

params.name: Loop
params.description: Whether or not to initially play the sound in a loop (repeating).

params.name: Volume
params.description: The attenuation in decibels (dB).  0 is original volume, -10 dB is about half as loud, etc.

params.name: Object
params.description: Choose the object to play the sound at.

params.name: Inner angle
params.description: The cone inner angle (for full volume sound for directional sources) in degrees. 360 means a non-directional sound.

params.name: Outer angle
params.description: The cone outer angle (where volume is reduced for directional sources) in degrees.

params.name: Outer gain
params.description: The volume reduction in decibels outside the outer angle, for directional sources.

params.name: Tag (optional)
params.description: A tag, which can be anything you like, to use to reference this sound in future.

actions.name: Play at position (by name)
actions.description: Play an audio file by its name at a position in the layout.
actions.display_text: Play [b]{1}[/b] {2} from {0} at volume {3} dB at position ([i]{4}[/i], [i]{5}[/i], [i]{6}[/i]), angle [i]{7}[/i] (inner angle [i]{8}[/i], outer angle [i]{9}[/i], outer gain [i]{10}[/i] dB) with tag [i]{11}[/i]

params.name: Folder
params.description: Choose the folder which contains the audio file.

params.name: Audio file name
params.description: A string with the name of the audio file to play, without the file extension.  For example, to play myfile.webm, use only "myfile".

params.name: Loop
params.description: Whether or not to initially play the sound in a loop (repeating).

params.name: Volume
params.description: The attenuation in decibels (dB).  0 is original volume, -10 dB is about half as loud, etc.

params.name: X
params.description: The X position in the layout to play the sound at.

params.name: Y
params.description: The Y position in the layout to play the sound at.

params.name: Angle
params.description: The angle in degrees to play at, if a directional source.

params.name: Inner angle
params.description: The cone inner angle (for full volume sound for directional sources) in degrees. 360 means a non-directional sound.

params.name: Outer angle
params.description: The cone outer angle (where volume is reduced for directional sources) in degrees.

params.name: Outer gain
params.description: The volume reduction in decibels outside the outer angle, for directional sources.

params.name: Tag (optional)
params.description: A tag, which can be anything you like, to use to reference this sound in future.

params.name: Z
params.description: The Z position in the layout to play the sound at.

actions.name: Play
actions.description: Play an audio file.
actions.display_text: Play [b]{0}[/b] {1} at volume {2} dB (stereo pan [i]{3}[/i], tag [i]{4}[/i])

params.name: Audio file
params.description: Choose the audio file to play.

params.name: Loop
params.description: Whether or not to initially play the sound in a loop (repeating).

params.name: Volume
params.description: The attenuation in decibels (dB).  0 is original volume, -10 dB is about half as loud, etc.

params.name: Tag (optional)
params.description: A tag, which can be anything you like, to use to reference this sound in future.

params.name: Stereo pan
params.description: The stereo pan, from -100 (left) to 100 (right), with 0 being middle.

actions.name: Set looping
actions.description: Enable or disable looping on a sound.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag identifying the sound to loop.  Leave empty to affect the last played sound.

params.name: State
params.description: Choose whether to turn looping on or off.

actions.name: Set muted
actions.description: Mute (make silent) or unmute a sound.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag identifying the sound to mute.  Leave empty to affect the last played sound.

params.name: State
params.description: Choose whether to mute or unmute the sound.

actions.name: Set volume
actions.description: Set the volume (loudness) of a sound.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag identifying the sound to change the volume for.  Leave empty to affect the last played sound.

params.name: dB
params.description: The attenuation in decibels (dB).  0 is original volume, -10 dB is about half as loud, etc.

actions.name: Preload
actions.description: Download an audio file from the server without playing it.  This ensures it will play immediately.

params.name: Audio file
params.description: Choose the audio file to preload.  It will be downloaded from the server but not played.

actions.name: Set playback rate
actions.description: Set the speed at which a sound plays at.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag identifying the sound to change the playback rate for.  Leave empty to affect the last played sound.

params.name: Playback rate
params.description: The rate of playback.  1.0 is normal speed, 0.5 half speed, 2.0 double speed, etc.

actions.name: Stop
actions.description: Stop a sound from playing.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag identifying the sound to stop.  Leave empty to affect the last played sound.

actions.name: Play (by name)
actions.description: Play an audio file using a string for the filename.
actions.display_text: Play [b]{1}[/b] {2} from {0} at {3} dB (stereo pan [i]{4}[/i], tag [i]{5}[/i])

params.name: Folder
params.description: Choose the folder which contains the audio file.

params.name: Audio file name
params.description: A string with the name of the audio file to play, without the file extension.  For example, to play myfile.webm, use only "myfile".

params.name: Loop
params.description: Whether or not to initially play the sound in a loop (repeating).

params.name: Volume
params.description: The attenuation in decibels (dB).  0 is original volume, -10 dB is about half as loud, etc.

params.name: Tag (optional)
params.description: A tag, which can be anything you like, to use to reference this sound in future.

params.name: Stereo pan
params.description: The stereo pan, from -100 (left) to 100 (right), with 0 being middle.

actions.name: Set silent
actions.description: Set silent mode.  In silent mode all current sounds are muted and no new sounds will play.

params.name: Mode
params.description: Set whether in silent mode or not.

actions.name: Preload (by name)
actions.description: Download an audio file by a string of its name from the server without playing it.

params.name: Folder
params.description: Choose the folder which contains the audio file to preload.

params.name: Audio file name
params.description: A string with the name of the audio file to preload, without the file extension.  For example, to load myfile.webm, use only "myfile".

actions.name: Set master volume
actions.description: Set the overall volume of all audio.

params.name: dB
params.description: The master attenuation in decibels (dB).  0 is original volume, -10 dB is about half as loud, etc.

actions.name: Set paused
actions.description: Pause or resume audio with a given tag.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The audio tag to pause or resume.

params.name: State
params.description: Whether to pause or resume the sound with the given tag.

actions.name: Seek to
actions.description: Seek to a particular location in a sound with a tag.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The audio tag to seek.

params.name: Position
params.description: The time in the audio to seek to, in seconds.

actions.name: Stop all
actions.description: Stop all currently playing sounds.

actions.name: Schedule next play
actions.description: Schedule the next Play action sample-accurately.

params.name: Time
params.description: Time in seconds at which to sample-accurately schedule the next Play. Normally this is of the form Audio.CurrentTime + N.

actions.name: Unload audio
actions.description: Unload an audio file from memory.

params.name: Audio file
params.description: Choose the audio file to unload.

actions.name: Unload audio (by name)
actions.description: Unload an audio file from memory by a string of its name.

params.name: Folder
params.description: Choose the folder which contains the audio file.

params.name: Audio file name
params.description: A string with the name of the audio file to unload, without the file extension.  For example, to unload myfile.webm, use only "myfile".

actions.name: Unload all audio
actions.description: Unload all audio files from memory.

actions.name: Fade volume
actions.description: Gradually change the volume of a sound over time.
actions.display_text: Fade [i]{0}[/i] volume to [b]{1}[/b] dB over [b]{2}[/b] seconds, then {3}

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag identifying the sound to change the volume for.  Leave empty to affect the last played sound.

params.name: dB
params.description: The attenuation in decibels (dB) to fade to.

params.name: Duration
params.description: The time in seconds to fade over.

params.name: On end
params.description: What to do when the fade finishes. For fade-outs, it's useful to stop the sound afterwards.

actions.name: Add remote URL
actions.description: Play audio from a URL by giving it a name to use with the actions that use a string for the name.

params.name: URL
params.description: URL to load the audio from. Note cross-domain requests require CORS.

params.name: Type
params.description: The content type (aka MIME type) of the audio loaded at the given URL. Note WebM Opus is the only format guaranteed to play on all platforms.

params.name: Name
params.description: The name to assign this URL. This name can then be used in the actions that use a string for the name.

actions.name: Add stereo pan effect
actions.description: Add a stereo left/right pan effect to all audio with a given tag.
actions.display_text: Add stereo pan effect to tag {0} ([i]{1}[/i])

params.name: Tag
params.description: The audio tag to process.

params.name: Stereo pan
params.description: The stereo pan, from -100 (left) to 100 (right), with 0 being middle.

actions.name: Set stereo pan
actions.description: Set the stereo (left/right) pan of a sound.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag identifying the sound to change.  Leave empty to affect the last played sound.

params.name: Stereo pan
params.description: The stereo pan, from -100 (left) to 100 (right), with 0 being middle.

actions.name: Set listener orientation
actions.description: Set the 3D orientation of the listener.
actions.display_text: Set listener orientation to forward ([i]{0}[/i], [i]{1}[/i], [i]{2}[/i]), up ([i]{3}[/i], [i]{4}[/i], [i]{5}[/i])

params.name: Forward X
params.description: The X component of the forward vector.

params.name: Forward Y
params.description: The Y component of the forward vector.

params.name: Forward Z
params.description: The Z component of the forward vector.

params.name: Up X
params.description: The X component of the up vector.

params.name: Up Y
params.description: The Y component of the up vector.

params.name: Up Z
params.description: The Z component of the up vector.

expressions.name: EffectCount
expressions.description: Get the current number of effects added to a tag.

params.name: Tag
params.description: Tag of the sound to use

expressions.name: AnalyserFreqBinCount
expressions.description: Get the number of frequency bins returned by an analyser effect.

params.name: Tag
params.description: Tag of the sound to use

params.name: Index
params.description: Index of the analyser effect

expressions.name: AnalyserFreqBinAt
expressions.description: Get the magnitude of an analyser's Nth frequency bin.

params.name: Tag
params.description: Tag of the sound to use

params.name: Index
params.description: Index of the analyser effect

params.name: Bin
params.description: Index of the frequency bin

expressions.name: AnalyserPeakLevel
expressions.description: Get the peak level from an analyser.

params.name: Tag
params.description: Tag of the sound to use

params.name: Index
params.description: Index of the analyser effect

expressions.name: AnalyserRMSLevel
expressions.description: Get the RMS level from an analyser.

params.name: Tag
params.description: Tag of the sound to use

params.name: Index
params.description: Index of the analyser effect

expressions.name: Duration
expressions.description: Get the duration in seconds of a sound with a tag.

params.name: Tag
params.description: Tag of the sound to use

expressions.name: PlaybackTime
expressions.description: Get the playback position in seconds of a sound with a tag.

params.name: Tag
params.description: Tag of the sound to use

expressions.name: Volume
expressions.description: Get the current volume, in decibels, of a sound with a tag.

params.name: Tag
params.description: Tag of the sound to use

expressions.name: MasterVolume
expressions.description: Get the current master volume, in decibels.

expressions.name: SampleRate
expressions.description: Get the audio output sample rate in Hz.

expressions.name: CurrentTime
expressions.description: Get the audio clock time in seconds.

expressions.name: PlaybackRate
expressions.description: Get the playback rate of a sound with a tag.

params.name: Tag
params.description: Tag of the sound to use

expressions.name: OutputLatency
expressions.description: Time delay in seconds for audio to actually be played on output device (or -1 if not known).

expressions.name: NormalizedVolume
expressions.description: Convert a volume in the range 0-100 to dB.

params.name: Volume
params.description: Volume in range 0-100

params.name: dbThreshold
params.description: dB level at volume 10, below which it reverts to linear ramp.
